// export default MemoizedMusicPlayer import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import useSound from "use-sound" import { AiFillPlayCircle, AiFillPauseCircle } from "react-icons/ai" import { BiSkipNext, BiSkipPrevious } from "react-icons/bi" import { IconContext } from "react-icons" const MusicPlayer = () => { const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false) const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState() // current position of the audio in seconds const apiUrl = "http://localhost:8080/api/music/stream" // Your backend API endpoint const [play, { pause, duration, sound }] = useSound(apiUrl, { format: "mp3", // Specify the audio format if needed }) const playingButton = () => { if (isPlaying) { pause() setIsPlaying(false) } else { play() setIsPlaying(true) } } return (

Playing Now

Music

Song

{!isPlaying ? ( ) : ( )}
) } export default MusicPlayer
